title: Multimodal Representation-Based Mathematical Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (functions, geometry, statistics), basic proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: A math problem-solving project utilizing multimodal representation in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Converting real-life problems into multimodal representations (graphics, role-play, digital content) and designing mathematical models
Completing a project to represent mathematical data in visual/auditory forms using smartphone applications
Analyzing the mathematical validity of multimodal representation methods through peer assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
